MonsterTrait.Name: Clurichaun's Luck
MonsterTrait.Text: Clurichauns add both their Dexterity and Charisma modifiers to their Armor Class.

MonsterTrait.Name: Innate Spellcasting
MonsterTrait.Text: The clurichaun's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 13). The clurichaun can cast the following spells, requiring only alcohol as a component. At will: friends, mending, minor illusion, purify food and drink, vicious mockery 1/day each: blur, calm emotions, heroism, sleep, suggestion

MonsterTrait.Name: Magic Resistance
MonsterTrait.Text: The clurichaun has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

MonsterAction.Name: Unarmed Strike
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 2 (1 + 1) bludgeoning damage.

MonsterAction.Name: Improvised Weapon
MonsterAction.Text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one creature. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing damage, depending on weapon.
